allAvailableResources_summit.description: Current level of all available resources given as an integer percentage for each particular resource. The data is obtained from the machine's sensors but can be set manually in case the sensors are broken.

possibleLaunchfiles_summit.description: The list of possible launchfiles. Doesn't depend on the available resources.

allAvailableResources_tb2.description: Current level of all available resources given as an integer percentage for each particular resource. The data is obtained from the machine's sensors but can be set manually in case the sensors are broken.

possibleLaunchfiles_tb2.description: The list of possible launchfiles. Doesn't depend on the available resources.

triggerBringup_summit.title: Trigger ROS launchfiles
triggerBringup_summit.description: Brings hw components up (corresponding ROS launch files are launched). Accepts launchfile id as input. Brings up all if no input is specified.

launchfileId.description: Defines what HW to bring up, launchfileId is one of possibleLaunchfiles property values, e.g., bringup_complete

output.description: Returns True/false and a message when all invoked promises are resolved (asynchronous).

mapStoreDB_summit.title: Store map on DB
mapStoreDB_summit.description: Get map data and store it to DB of the VO

filename_tosave_summit.description: which filename to save map in db

mapReadDB_summit.title: Read map from DB
mapReadDB_summit.description: Get map from DB of the VO

filename_map_summit.description: which filename to get from db

output.description: Returns map in string format from DB on VO.

filenamesReadDB_summit.title: Read map from DB
filenamesReadDB_summit.description: Get map from DB of the VO

output.description: Returns map in string format from DB on VO.

filenames_db_summit.description: which filename to get from db

currentValues_summit.description: Returns current Values for battery status from summit through the Consumed Thing

triggerBringup_tb2.title: Trigger ROS launchfiles
triggerBringup_tb2.description: Brings hw components up (corresponding ROS launch files are launched). Accepts launchfile id as input. Brings up all if no input is specified.

launchfileId.description: Defines what HW to bring up, launchfileId is one of possibleLaunchfiles property values, e.g., bringup_complete

output.description: Returns True/false and a message when all invoked promises are resolved (asynchronous).

mapStoreDB_tb2.title: Store map on DB
mapStoreDB_tb2.description: Get map data and store it to DB of the VO

filename_tosave_tb2.description: which filename to save map in db

mapReadDB_tb2.title: Read map from DB
mapReadDB_tb2.description: Get map from DB of the VO

filename_map_tb2.description: which filename to get from db

output.description: Returns map in string format from DB on VO.

filenamesReadDB_tb2.title: Read map from DB
filenamesReadDB_tb2.description: Get map from DB of the VO

output.description: Returns map in string format from DB on VO.

filenames_db_tb2.description: which filename to get from db

currentValues_tb2.description: Returns current Values for battery status from tb2 through the Consumed Thing

outOfResource_summit.description: Out of resource event. Emitted when the available resource level is not sufficient to operate further (e.g., battery level).

outOfResource_tb2.description: Out of resource event. Emitted when the available resource level is not sufficient to operate further (e.g., battery level).
